# [Interview #1150: Librarypalooza, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1150#3)

#### FeatherWriter

Is Iyatil from Southern Scadrial?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Iyatil (he pronounced it like yah-till) has heritage along those lines, but she is not.

#### FeatherWriter

Is her mask Invested?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Mmm, no.

#### Tags

Iyatil
,

Scadrial
